Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Reroute at Diversey/Lamon
ShortDescription: 76 Diversey buses are temp rerouted via Diversey, Laramie, Belmont, Cicero & resume their regular route on Diversey due to street blockage near Diversey/Lamon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Laramie, Belmont, Cicero and resume their regular route on Diversey due to, street blockage near Diversey/Lamont.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 92nd/Burley
ShortDescription: Eastbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted  via 92nd, Houston, 91st, and Brandon over regular route due to street blockage near 92nd/Burley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted  via 92nd, Houston, 91st, and Brandon over regular route due to street blockage near 92nd/Burley.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
